title: Time wasted?
body: I wanted to figure out how many games i have played and all the time I wasted playing. However i can only find this ranked season. I want to know the total amount of time wasted all of my ranked seasons and all of my game sessions. Due to the fact i was playing in beta i assume it is a butt ton

replies.body: Looks like your account has a little over 2000 games played! I don't have exact numbers on hours or anything like that, but you could roughly calculate it based on an average match time of like 25-30 min.
Wait can you do that for me {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
